name: Minions, Monsters, and Madness
description: Minions, Monsters, and Madness is a story driven strategy/JRPG with DND style events! In this game you will make decisions that will directly influence the outcome of every hand written event in the game! Find minions to join you on your adventure in order to save the world as you know it from utter annihilation!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7-10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core (more cores and/or GHz recommended for higher settings) Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 70 MB available space
